member.summary: Returns whether the specific event should be tracked
member.returns: true if the event should be tracked

member.name: M:Google.WebAnalytics.GoogleAnalytics.AssociatedObject_Unloaded(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Remove the event handlers and behavior

member.name: M:Google.WebAnalytics.GoogleAnalytics.DetachEvents
member.summary: Detach events and the image

member.name: M:Google.WebAnalytics.GoogleAnalytics.ReadSessionData
member.summary: this will pull out all stored values from local storage in to member variables. This includes visitorId, first session time, previous session time, current session time, session count and last event time. This should be called once at startup from OnAttached().
member.returns: true if this is a new Visitor

member.name: M:Google.WebAnalytics.GoogleAnalytics.WriteSessionData
member.summary: a utility method that writes all of those values back to local storage. This is called from UpdateSession below whenever any of these values changes.

member.name: M:Google.WebAnalytics.GoogleAnalytics.UpdateSession(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: call this every time you process an event, pass in the event's timestamp as the argument to the method. In here keep track of session information, basically starting a new session when the last event time is more than 30 min older than the timestamp parameter passed in. Be sure to call WriteSessionData every time (to at least save the last event time).
member.param: the timestamp of the event being processed

member.name: M:Google.WebAnalytics.GoogleAnalytics.OnTrackEvent(System.Object,Microsoft.WebAnalytics.AnalyticsEventArgs)
member.summary: If Native tracking, then format a URL for the image, otherwise format a URL for the JavaScript API

member.name: M:Google.WebAnalytics.GoogleAnalytics.UpdateImage(Microsoft.WebAnalytics.AnalyticsEventArgs)
member.summary: Update the image of the Page tag

member.name: M:Google.WebAnalytics.GoogleAnalytics.BuildUrl(Microsoft.WebAnalytics.AnalyticsEvent)
member.summary: Build a URL like this: http://www.google-analytics.com/__utm.gif?utmwv=4.3&utmn=742040714&utmhn=xmldocs.net&utmt=event&utme=5(ABC*Click*%2FMyButton)(314)&utmcs=utf-8&utmsr=1680x1050&utmsc=32-bit&utmul=en-us&utmje=1&utmfl=10.0%20r22&utmdt=GoogleAnalyticsTest&utmhid=1805427388&utmr=-&utmp=/ga/&utmac=UA-86356-3&utmcc=__utma%3D50180655.1976482529.1243975974.1245349189.1245705737.6%3B%2B__utmz%3D50180655.1243975974.1.1.utmccn%3D(direct)%7Cutmcsr%3D(direct)%7Cutmcmd%3D(none)%3B
member.param: the event to turn into a GIF image request
member.returns: the URL to the Google Analytics GIF image
member.remarks: we don't use utmje or utmfl because this can be running out of the browser
